SummaryEnglish: Sano Yuji, a black company employee, is summoned to another world while finishing his work at home. His profession in the other world, a Monster Tamer, is considered a job that makes it difficult to become an adventurer. However, thanks to some slimes he met, which read several magical books, he gained magical powers and the second profession, Sage. Yuji acquired overwhelming power, but is he conscience of his strength? Blindly becoming unparalleled and strongest in the world!
Aliases: 転生賢者の異世界ライフ
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life: Dai-2 no Shokugyou wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life ~Daini no Shokugyou wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita~
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life - Daini no Shokugyo wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Raifu ~Daini no Shokugyō o Ete, Sekai Saikyō ni Narimashita~
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life: Daini no Shokugyou wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life: Daini no Shokugyou o Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita
Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life: Daini no Shokugyō o Ete, Sekai Saikyō ni Narimashita
The Reincarnated Sage's Alternate World Life: I Got a Second Profession, and Became the Most Powerful in the World
My Isekai Life: I Gained a Second Character Class and Became the Strongest Sage in the World!

1.TitleEnglish: I Wanted to Protect the Town
1.SummaryEnglish: What can a single Tamer do against an entire army of 10,000 monsters with just a wolf, a dryad and a handful of slimes?

2.SummaryEnglish: Yuji’s party members don’t have a high opinion of Tamers, but his tracking skills are too valuable to pass up. Maybe Yuji can change their minds once they see him in action.

3.SummaryEnglish: Yuji overdoes everything, even when he’s trying not to. But when a dragon appears underneath the calamitous blue moon, the Tamer may be the only one who can prevent disaster.

4.SummaryEnglish: A dragon is a formidable opponent. That's precisely why Yuji needs to get up close and personal to fight it with... a dagger!?

5.SummaryEnglish: A hard freeze means a high demand for firewood. It's time for Yuji to use his overpowered skills for a more mundane purpose, especially since delicious food is involved!

6.SummaryEnglish: The bad news? There’s something sinister going on in that remote village. The good news? The cult stationed there has no idea Yuji is on to them.

7.SummaryEnglish: Yuji has a price on his head and two assassins are after him. He could easily defeat them, but that would only make him a bigger target. This calls for a more unique approach.

8.SummaryEnglish: If Yuji wants quality armor, he’ll need quality materials. And that means hunting a rare monster.

9.SummaryEnglish: Yuji must now protect the town from the kaiju-level threat of a rampaging Fire Dragon.

10.TitleEnglish: Didn't Seem Like a Good Time for That
10.SummaryEnglish: According to legend, an emissary is supposed to stop the Blue Moon of Salvation’s leader. Steyl is now convinced that Yuji is the one he’s been waiting for.

11.SummaryEnglish: The battle between Yuji and Walter begins in earnest, but that is only the beginning.

12.SummaryEnglish: Yuji may be strong, but he can’t fight the enemy and defend all the towns at once. If he wants to win, he needs to place his trust in all the friends he made along the way.
